https://pypi.org/project/michael-tools/
Personal toolkit

file_operation
- create_file
- delete_file
- read_file
- get_unique_filepath
- append_to_file

json_operation
- dict_to_str
- str_to_dict
- read_file_to_dict
- write_dict_to_file

time_operation
- get_current_time
- get_n_days_ago
- get_current_time_str
- get_current_date_str

openapi_op
- call_model(prompt, model_name="deepseek-r1", show_process=True, stream=True)

txt_handler
- remove_trailing_newline

`0.0.6` add openapi_op

Hope it helps you!
